name: ROGUE TORPEDO 2
description:
A sequel to an unreleased game I made called Rogue Torpedo. The goal of the game is to destroy an enemy Submarine by controlling guided torpedoes into the enemy sub, all while protecting your own submarine and avoiding bombs sprinkled around the ocean depths. The enemy sub will also fire it's own torpedoes at the players submarine, so the player must think quickly on when to use their torpedoes for defense and when to use them for offense. There's also detached debris that can be pushed and manipulated to block enemy torpedoes from destroying your own submarine.

This game requires a gamepad
